title: War in Ukraine: A conversation with Oleg Ustenko
description: In this episode of the Sound of Economics Live Guntram Wolff hosts Oleg Ustenko, Economic Advisor to Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky. They discuss the economic situation in Ukraine as well as humanitarian needs and Ukraineâ€™s request to ban Russian exports of fossil fuels.
itunes:summary: Oleg Ustenko, Economic Advisor to Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky joins us to discuss the situation in Ukraine.
